text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Chari-Baguirmi | native_name = شاري باقرمي | native_name_lang = ar | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = Chari River.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Chari River | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Chari-Bagumi.jpg | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of Chad showing Chari-Baguirmi. | mapsize = 200px | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Chad | subdivision_type1 = Departments | subdivision_name1 = 3 | subdivision_type2 = Sub-prefectures | subdivision_name2 = 13 | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Regional capital | seat = Massenya | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Chari-Baguirmi is one of the 23 regions of Chad. Its capital is Massenya. The Chari River flows through the west and south of the region. The Chari-Baguirmi region is divided into three departments: * Baguirmi (capital of Massenya) * Chari (capital of Mandélia) * Loug Chari (capital of Bousso). Category:Regions of Chad
title: Chari-Baguirmi Region
